document.full_text: horror, suspense and plastic surgery gone wild made for an explosive mix thursday with "the skin i live in," a step into darker ground for spanish director pedro almodovar as he aims for the top prize at cannes.
document.title: almodovar catches cannes off guard with horror film
lines_and_colors: horror, suspense and plastic surgery gone wild made for an explosive mix thursday with "the skin i live in," a step into darker ground for spanish director pedro almodovar as he aims for the top prize at cannes.
